In an interview with a Hispanic actress/reporter, President Obama was asked “If illegal immigrants go out and vote will they be deported?” His response was “NO THEY WILL NOT” Mind you; she asks if “ILLEGAL” immigrants can vote!!! WHAT!!! It is against the law for illegal alien’s in the U.S. “ILLEGALLY” to vote in the U.S. elections! In fact for anyone not a U.S. citizen to vote is in our elections is “ILLEGAL” … Is the RIGGED System going as high as the Presidency? Everyone should be OUTRAGED about his answer and his apparent participation in helping to corrupt the election system. No wonder when the GOP wants State or Government ID’s for everyone for them to be eligible to vote, they yell NO! We must end the corruption in the US!!!… K.C.McCaslin…
